title: Lady Houns win in nine
text: Lady Houns win in nine Comment Posted Oct. 8, 2015 at 12:00 PM Posted Oct. 8, 2015 at 12:00 PM The Lady Houns softball team beat El Dorado Springs on the road on Monday, winning in nine innings by a 6-5 score. Aurora got on the board in the third inning with one run and then added three more in the fourth. Each team scored a run in the sixth inning to make it a 5-1 ballgame in favor of the Lady Houns. The Lady Bulldogs rallied for four runs in the bottom of the seventh to force extra innings. Neither team would score in the eighth, but the Lady Houns took the lead on an RBI single by senior Jacy Clayton in the ninth. Junior Morgan Montgomery would hang on to get the win in the bottom half of the inning, capping off an eight-strikeout night. The Lady Houns played in the first round of districts on Wednesday at Monett. Score and game details were unavailable at press time. Look for full story in next week's edition. Aurora Advertiser - Aurora, MO
